summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Sections 13B.0, 13C.2, 13C.3, 15.1, 15.24, 16.1, 16.3, 17.1, 1721, 17.3, 17A.1, 18.1, 19.1, 23.1 and 23.41 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) and adding a new Section 23.31 to said Ordinance to implement the offstreet parking policies for Downtown Seattle expressed in Resolution 24957.
